entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Natashquan
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 06:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -18.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Natashquan Airport 09:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -18.9°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -28
Dewpoint: -21.8°C
Wind: NE 15 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 50 gusting to 70 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 29 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 02 February 2023
